short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances the user experience of the Misc forum on www.bodybuilding.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension improves the user experience of Miscers on the www.bodybuilding.com forums by providing some useful features.

Features List:
- Auto embed all youtube and image links with a click of a button
- Extra post formatting tags bar that bodybuilding.com disables by default
- A decent spoiler tag implementation
- Reputation reminder notes so you will never forget to rep/neg on recharge ever again.
- A copypasta management system for easy access to your favourite ones
- Hide posts from groups of users such as reds, no avatars and new members
- Automated cliff notes for posts longer than 200 words
